seed_pair.target: She followed me down to the shops.
seed_pair.known: Ella me siguió hasta las tiendas.

seed_pair.target: However much I argued I still had to share.
seed_pair.known: Por mucho que argumenté todavía tuve que compartir.

seed_pair.target: I had to share my toys with my sister.
seed_pair.known: Tuve que compartir mis juguetes con mi hermana.

seed_pair.target: I need to lie down in the garden.
And I need to close my eyes for a while.
seed_pair.known: Y necesito cerrar los ojos por un rato.

seed_pair.target: I suspect that he's heard a hundred stories about it.
seed_pair.known: Sospecho que ha oído cien historias sobre ello.

seed_pair.target: He's heard a thousand stories about what they were doing.
seed_pair.known: Ha oído mil historias sobre lo que estaban haciendo.

seed_pair.target: I'd have been happy to drive if you'd told me.
seed_pair.known: Habría estado feliz de conducir si me lo hubieras dicho.

seed_pair.target: I'd have driven if you'd told me how tired you were.
seed_pair.known: Habría conducido si me hubieras dicho lo cansado que estabas.
